resources.string: Begin by connecting power and ground rails.
Insert IC first if you need it.
Unit test trial here for you
Test: Press and release button can yield 1 or 0.
Test: Follow the test code in Arduino.
Connect 5V, ground and pin for analogRead.
LCD: Read the overlayed datasheet carefully.
Button: A,B and C,D are always connected. \n Resistor to 5V and black to ground.
Trimpot: 5V and GND can be exchanged.
From the top view of sensor, the left pin is 5V and the right is ground.
Button: A and B are always connected, C and D either. \nInput and Digital
